story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - MERCK & CO. INC. (MRK.N) Current Prior Rating Outperform Peer perform --Bear Stearns said it sees upside to several new products as consensus appears to be underestimating performance. The drugmaker's Januvia treatment for diabetes and vaccines are new pillars of growth, the brokerage said. --The brokerage raised its 2007 earnings estimate on the company to $2.64 from $2.62, and for 2008 to $2.82 from $2.72. Bear Stearns has a price target of $53 on the stock. (Reporting by Neha Singh in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - bear stearns ups merck to outperform
